ygData.subject: Re: Powreleveling trades?
ygData.msgSnippet: The poor man s route is sometimes the best. Many of the items made in the trade skills find no buyer. My thoughts are to minimize my losses. My Vah Shir Bard
ygData.messageBody:
The poor man's route is sometimes the best. Many
of the items made in the trade skills find no buyer.
My thoughts are to minimize my losses. My Vah Shir
Bard (who was level 7 at the time) spent 17pp and went
from a 2 in pottery to 108 in less than two hours
(mainly due to clay being not stackable) I had to run
back and forth from the supplier to the pottery wheel
but it was fun. <br><br>I made med jars until trivial
(36) and then I switched to med bowls which trivial at
122. I quit before I got that far because my hands
where getting tired from all the clicking.
<br><br>Hepkat<br>8th Bard<br><br>Timmye Cousteau<br>30th Druid
